(row = 13, col = 1)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 13, col = 1)

Given that my avatar has not moved from the last state, I need to take a different action from the last time. Since the current position is `(row = 13, col = 1)` and the map indicates that this location does not have a collectible or immediate danger (the adjacent space below at `(row = 14, col = 1)` is a wall), I should consider a different action.

Since I can only rotate without movement right now, I will try to move to the right where I can find more empty space or collectibles. Thus, I will take action to move right towards `(row = 13, col = 2)`.

``` Action:3 ```
This action should help reposition my avatar towards potential exploration areas while adhering to our strategy of avoiding monsters and looking for gems.
